title: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view for the first time, the focus immediately jumps to the library file node instead.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.

Observed Behavior: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in library outline view. The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected Behavior: When clicking on an item in the library outline view, it should be selected as expected, and the focus should not shift to the library file node.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Click on any item in the outline view and verify that it is selected correctly.
